# Introduction

As the first project featured on the site, I decided to start with something fairly straight-forward. I'll be analyzing data related to alcohol consumption among secondary school students. The data is publicly available on kaggle [here](https://www.kaggle.com/uciml/student-alcohol-consumption#student-mat.csv). I'll analyze the data using R via RStudio in a R Markdown document.

## Data description

The data is spread across two csv files, and contains a variables addressing a variety of family and school-related factors. The datasets will be combined prior to analysis (conveniently, a simple merge script is included with the data). A summary of the variables is displayed below.

```{r}
source('data_files/student)
```
